What Do I Do When I Get Arrested?

A Quick Video Reference

1st. Step Know Your Laws and Know Your Rights

Getting Arrested, is not fun.And well, wheather you did something wrong or you are being wrongfully, arrested. It is important for you to know the process, and to understand your rights.

Battiling Misconceptions

Many people have misconceptions about the law and the police, primarily due to Hollywood media. And often have the "well you shouldn't have been doing what your were doing to get arrested in the first place" or "If you didn't do anything wrong then just talk to the police to clear things up." and in a ideal just society that should be the case;however, we do not live in a ideal society. There are over 10,000 federal offenses that can land you in prison for more than 20 years, and the average American commits at least 3 of these federal offenses not being aware they are committing the crime.
